price: ئەوانەی کەدەترسن لە پەروەردگاریان بەنادیاری وپەنھانی وەئەوان (کەسانێکن) لە ڕۆژی دوایی زۆر دەترسن
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
